thread.title: Juliana
thread.title_full: Federal Direct Tax Services reviewed by Juliana

author: Juliana
title: Juliana
text: In joining the Federal Direct family I have found thorough training, excellent support and encouragement that I have not found with other tax preparation companies out there. I would and will recommend FDTS to all who ask for a reputable company to assist them with their needs. It is a privilege to be connected with this company.
